posts.post_content:
For sale:  SGC 20 T204 Coakley [S]$75 ppd[/S] SOLD.  Nice image with some minor staining.  The white scratch on the front was on the image negative (i.e., all Coakley T204's have it).  Paper affixed to the back, which accounts for the FR grade.  Any form of payment is okay.

[IMG]http://t207.com/images/sale/t204/t204_coakley_sgc20_both.jpg[/IMG]
